channel.title: wireless on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in wireless on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-17
item.description: Apple reportedly wants to make its own wireless chips for the iPhone (2 minute read) Apple is opening an office in southern California and hiring engineers to work on wireless radios, radio-frequency integrated circuits, and a wireless SoC.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-02
item.description: Supposed Google Health app leak shows early interface (2 minute read) Screenshots from the upcoming Google Health app have been leaked online.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-29
item.description: Netflix’s new ‘Play Something’ shuffle feature is here to solve your movie night indecision (1 minute read) Play Something is a new feature for Netflix that automatically suggests new shows and movies.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-19
item.description: Apple Hiring Engineers to Develop 6G Wireless (3 minute read) Apple recently posted job ads looking for wireless system research engineers for current and next-generation networks.
